text: This list includes all players from Kenya who have played at least one T20I match. ==Key== General * – Captain * – Wicket-keeper * First – Year of debut * Last – Year of latest game * Mat – Number of matches played Batting * Runs – Runs scored in career * HS – Highest score * Avg – Runs scored per dismissal * 50 – Number of half centuries * 100 – Centuries scored * * – Batsman remained not out Bowling * Balls – Balls bowled in career * Wkt – Wickets taken in career * BBI – Best bowling in an innings * Ave – Average runs per wicket Fielding * Ca – Catches taken * St – Stumpings affected ==List of players== Last updated 20 November 2021.Players / Kenya / T20I caps – ESPNcricinfo. Retrieved 18 November 2015.
